descr_WRONG_TOKEN.en: The token you entered is invalid. Please check your token. If you use a software token, your local time might be to far off!

descr_MISSING_TOKEN.en: Please enter your One Time Password to proceed.

descr_2FA_REQUIRED_BUT_INVALID.en: You did not properly set up your Two Factor Authentication. Please contact your Help Desk for further information.

descr_UNKNOWN_ERROR.en: An unknown error occured. Please contact your Help Desk for further information.
